name: Roulette 98
overview: When started you'll see a playfield on the left. On top of the playfield you'll see the text Press F Keys for Money. F1 is $10, F2 is $20, F3 is $50, F4 is $100, F5 is $250, F6 is $1000 and F7 is $5000. Use the mouse to indicate where to bet and press the left button, a coin will appear to mark your bet. A total of 40 bets may be made. F10 starts a new round. Press U to undo, S to toggle sound. There is a built in Help screen.
